燳字的基本解释

燳
zhào
古同“照”。

燳字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhào］
［《廣韻》之少切，去笑，章。］
亦作“曌1”。亦作“炤1”。亦作“燳1”。“昭2”的被通假字。
(1)光线照射；照耀。
(2)相映；辉映。
(3)明亮；光明。
(4)日光。
(5)察知；明白。
(6)示悉；告知。参见“照會”。
(7)昭示；反映。
(8)看。
(9)对比；比照。
(10)反射影像。
(11)图像；相片。
(12)拍摄（影片或照片）。
(13)镜子。
(14)证明；凭证。
(15)关心；照料。
(16)对付；招架。
(17)副词。表示按原样或某种标准做。
(18)介词。朝；向。
(19)介词。按；依。
(20)介词。比。
(21)佛教语。博大精深的慧力。与“寂”相对。
(22)泛指观察力。

燳字的康熙字典解释

【備考】【巳集】【火字部】　燳； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页685第20
【字彙補】同照。

燳字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
燳字的起名意思

暂无。

燳
Basic explanation of words
燳
zhào
Gu Tong "photographed".
燳
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhào］
["Guangyun" less cut, laugh, chapter. ]
Also known as "曌1". Also known as "炤1". Also known as "燳1". "Zhao 2" was passed falsely.
(1) Light shine; shine.
(2) Reflecting; Huiying.
(3) Bright; bright.
(4) Daylight.
(5) Observe and understand; understand.
(6) Inform; inform. See "Notes".
(7) Publicity; reflection.
(8) Look.
(9) Contrast; compare.
(10) Reflected image.
(11) Images; photos.
(12) Shooting (movies or photos).
(13) Mirror.
(14) Proof; certificate.
(15) Caring; taking care of.
(16) Deal with; parry.
(17) Adverbs. Means to do as-is or a certain standard.
(18) Prepositions. Towards;
(19) Prepositions. Press; by.
(20) Prepositions. ratio.
(21) Buddhist language. Broad and profound wisdom. Contrast with "Jie".
(22) Broadly refers to the power of observation.
燳
